EmailTemplate.description: Replay: Transform Your Customer Experience + Gain Insights
EmailTemplate.name: eCommerce Freshop Campaign.12-20-21 RET eCommerce Freshop Campaign Phase 2 Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar replay: Get the Most out of Your eCommerce Solution
EmailTemplate.textOnly: The old way of grocery shopping isn’t likely to make a comeback. That’s actually a good thing for retailers, so long as the right solutions are in place to accommodate the surge in online shopping traffic. Watch the replay of our Progressive Grocer webinar to hear Freshop’s Brian Moyer and Northgate’s Mike Hendry discuss the four ways Northgate uses eCommerce to transform customer experience and gain consumer insights. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
